item.title: CVE-2021-36884|2024-08-04T01:01:59.779Z -- backupbliss -- backup%20migration%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability discovered in WordPress Backup Migration plugin <= 1.1.5 versions.
